member.summary: The Microsoft Teams ID for the team with which the content is associated.

member.name: P:Hrm.Client.Web.Interop.TeamsSDK.TeamsTeamContext.UserRole
member.summary: The user's role in the team. Because a malicious party can run your content in a browser, this value should be used only as a hint as to the user's role, and never as proof of her role.

member.summary: Represents whether PSTN calling is allowed for the current logged in User.

member.name: P:Hrm.Client.Web.Interop.TeamsSDK.TeamsUserContext.LoginHint
member.summary: A value suitable for use as a login_hint when authenticating with Azure AD. Because a malicious party can run your content in a browser, this value should be used only as a hint as to who the user is and never as proof of identity. This field is available only when the identity permission is requested in the manifest.

member.name: P:Hrm.Client.Web.Interop.TeamsSDK.TeamsUserContext.LicenseType
member.summary: The license type for the current user.

member.name: P:Hrm.Client.Web.Interop.TeamsSDK.TeamsUserContext.Id
member.summary: The Azure AD object id of the current user. Because a malicious party run your content in a browser, this value should be used only as a hint as to who the user is and never as proof of identity. This field is available only when the identity permission is requested in the manifest.

member.name: P:Hrm.Client.Web.Interop.TeamsSDK.TeamsUserContext.UserPrincipalName
member.summary: The UPN of the current user. This may be an externally-authenticated UPN (e.g., guest users). Because a malicious party run your content in a browser, this value should be used only as a hint as to who the user is and never as proof of identity. This field is available only when the identity permission is requested in the manifest.

member.name: M:Hrm.Client.Web.Pages.Organization.BaseData.IdentificationTypes.IdentificationTypeFormBase.IdNumberLengthRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
[#*]
Explanation:
○ Match a character in the set [#*].

member.name: M:Hrm.Client.Web.Pages.Organization.BaseData.IdentificationTypes.IdentificationTypeFormBase.IdNumberPatternRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^[!@_\\-#$%^&*(),.?:{}|<>]+$
Explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match a character in the set [!#-&(-*,-.:<>-@^_{-}] atomically at least once.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.
